content.question: The excerpt could best be used to explain which of the following postwar situations?

choices.label: The emergence of the United States as a global superpower
The threat posed by belligerents unwilling to surrender
The impact of internment policies on relations between the United States and Japan
The difficulties of rebuilding nations damaged by combat

content.answer: The emergence of the United States as a global superpower

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
